definition: to work/(of a machine) to operate/job/work/task/CL:個|个[ge4],份[fen4],項|项[xiang4]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to do one's work/to work on sb/to try to persuade sb

sentences.english: For Saliou, the work in the mines goes on.
sentences.chinese: 对Saliou来说，矿山的工作还要继续。

sentences.english: Dr Kraabel began as an editor with the Edanz Group in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年开始为理文编辑工作，担任编辑。

sentences.english: Many disaster will happen every day in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在这个世界上，天天都邑发生很多灾难性的工作。

sentences.english: She’s always grousing about the work-load.
MBL's work is truly amazing, thank you for letting me be a part of it.
sentences.chinese: MBL的工作确实是惊人的，谢谢你让我成为一部分。

sentences.english: It's part of the job description. - …
His father works at the weather station.
I was a Teacher for America Corp member and I now work for TFA.
sentences.chinese: 我是为美国而教的成员，现在为组织工作。

sentences.english: With all the variety and adventure, Able Seaman Green said she enjoyed her work.
sentences.chinese: 面对变化和冒险，二等兵格林说她非常喜欢她的工作。

sentences.english: Dr. Stevens has worked at the language institute since 1982.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯从1982年起就一直在语言学院工作。
老板喜欢认真工作的员工。

sentences.english: Think about what are people willing to pay for, says Ms. Dunningham.
sentences.chinese: “想想人们愿意出钱做的工作，”坎宁安说。“

sentences.english: At least 3 years facility related work experience.
sentences.chinese: 至少3年厂务相关的工作经验。

sentences.english: Moni tor work quality and feedback abnormality to WT engineer.
sentences.chinese: 监督工作质量并及时向工程师反馈异常。

sentences.english: The semi-duplex work form was adopted between suspending gap sensor and control…
sentences.chinese: 而悬浮间隙传感器和控制器间则采用半双工方式工作。

sentences.english: This pizza parlor offers free delivery on weeknights.
sentences.chinese: 披萨店在工作日夜晚提供免费外送服务。

definition: to go to work/to be on duty/to start work/to go to the office
to go for/to engage in/to undertake/to deal with/to handle/to do
to do one's work/to work on sb/to try to persuade sb
undertaking/project/activity/(charitable, political or revolutionary) cause/publicly funded institution, enterprise or foundation/career/occupation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to leave early and return late (idiom)
